name: Fragments (itch) (Cosmic Waypoint, Maskedsound)
description:
You wake up alone in the woods with no memory of where your companions have gone. Find clues to help you piece together what happened.

Features 2 endings.

Made for the Toadhouse Visual Novel Game Jam! Check out the other games in the jam here.

Credits:

Lead Writer & Lead Programmer - Paris Davidson

Artist & Writer - Erin Jade Raven

Composer, Sound Designer, & Audio Programmer - Maskedsound
